data.comment: The match has started at Sapporo.
Shunta Tanaka (Sapporo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 2, Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Shimizu's Kenta Nishizawa is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Free kick Sapporo.
Goal! Hwang Seok-Ho gives Shimizu a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Yusuke Goto to set up the goal.
In the minute 7, Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Sapporo.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Attention is being given to Sapporo’s Takuma Arano and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 13, Michael Petrovic (Sapporo) is making a first change, with Anderson Lopes replacing the possibly injured Takuma Arano.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
In the minute 16, Penalty! Tadashi Nakamura points to the spot, great chance for Sapporo...
Anderson Lopes scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a Shimizu throw-in in Sapporo's half.
Tadashi Nakamura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 24, Tadashi Nakamura awards Sapporo a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
In the minute 30, Elsinho (Shimizu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Sapporo.
Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In the minute 35, Important block from the Shimizu defence as Anderson Lopes fires in a strike for Sapporo.
In Sapporo Sapporo drive forward through Anderson Lopes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sapporo take a 2-1 lead thanks to Anderson Lopes.
In the minute 36, Jay Bothroyd with an assist there.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Shimizu.
In Sapporo, Tomoki Takamine of Sapporo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Great finish from Kim Min-Tae to give Sapporo a 3-1 lead.
Jay Bothroyd instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 42, Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Sapporo.
Ryo Takeuchi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Shimizu.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Sapporo.
In the minute 45, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Sapporo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 45, Shimizu to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Kenta Nishizawa of Shimizu gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Tadashi Nakamura signals a Sapporo throw-in in Shimizu's half.
The away team replace Yusuke Goto with Yuito Suzuki.
Free kick Shimizu.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
In the minute 48, Shimizu surge into the attack at Sapporo but Hwang Seok-Ho’s header is off-target.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
In the minute 50, Shimizu are pushing forward but Yuito Suzuki's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
In the minute 52, Jay Bothroyd (Sapporo) strikes at Sapporo but his header is cleared.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
Tadashi Nakamura awards Sapporo a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Shimizu's Yugo Tatsuta attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
In the minute 57, Sapporo advance rapidly upfield but Tadashi Nakamura blows for offside.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Shimizu.
In Sapporo, Shimizu push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Tadashi Nakamura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Sapporo push forward at Sapporo and Jay Bothroyd gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Shimizu defence.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
Sapporo's Hiroki Miyazawa misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's now 4-1 in Sapporo as Jay Bothroyd scores for Sapporo.
In the minute 64, That's a fine assist from Lucas Fernandes.
Throw-in Shimizu.
Sapporo make their second substitution with Hugo Vieira replacing Jay Bothroyd.
In the minute 66, Michael Petrovic (Sapporo) is making a third substitution, with Daiki Suga replacing Takuro Kaneko.
Sapporo drives forward and Anderson Lopes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Shimizu at Sapporo.
Teerasil Dangda is replacing Kenta Nishizawa for Shimizu at Sapporo.
Yasufumi Nishimura is replacing Ryo Takeuchi for the away team.
In the minute 71, Shimizu are coming forward and Yuito Suzuki gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shimizu's Teerasil Dangda gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sapporo defender.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Shimizu.
Akito Fukumori puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 5-1.
Throw-in for Shimizu at Sapporo.
In the minute 75, Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Anderson Lopes of Sapporo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 79, Peter Cklamovski is making the team's fourth substitution at Sapporo with Kota Miyamoto replacing Keita Nakamura.
The away team have replaced Carlinhos Junior with Shota Kaneko. This is the fifth substitution made today by Peter Cklamovski.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
In the minute 80, Shimizu have a dangerous throw-in.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a Sapporo throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Kosuke Shirai is on a sub for Lucas Fernandes for Sapporo.
In the minute 81, The home team have replaced Yoshiaki Komai with Kazuki Fukai. This is the fifth substitution made today by Michael Petrovic.
Sapporo are caught offside.
Throw-in Shimizu.
In the minute 84, Sapporo's Daiki Suga breaks free at Sapporo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, Tadashi Nakamura signals a throw-in for Sapporo, close to Shimizu's area.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
In the minute 89, Tadashi Nakamura awards Sapporo a goal kick.
Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Sapporo.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Yuito Suzuki of Shimizu gets in a strike, but is off target.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Sapporo.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Free kick in a good position for Shimizu!
Shimizu's Yuito Suzuki gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sapporo defender.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In Sapporo, Yugo Tatsuta (Shimizu) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sapporo.
The match has come to a close in Sapporo. The final score is 5-1.
